articles.author: Stuart Lau, Aitor Hernández-Morales
articles.title: NATO ministers' doubts, fears and eye-rolls over €100B Ukraine plan - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Making military aid to Kyiv more predictable would send a message to Russia that it won’t win the war, said the alliance chief.
articles.content:
Jan Lipavský, the Czech foreign minister, said: "We do welcome the initiative and we need to see practicalities and the details."
